com.mymed.model.core.wrapper
Interface IWrapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
Wrapper
public interface IWrapper

Author:
lvanni This class represent the DAO pattern: Access to data varies depending on the source of the data. Access to persistent storage, such as to a database, varies greatly depending on the type of storage Use a Data Access Object (DAO) to abstract and encapsulate all access to the data source. The DAO manages the connection with the data source to obtain and store data.
